name: Proof_340 — Morning Observation of the Last Remaining Duck MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the morning observation of the single remaining duck at MaMeeFarm, recorded on 16 December 2025 at 06:56 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows one adult duck walking alone within the farm enclosure. Food remnants are visible on the ground, indicating normal feeding conditions. Despite regular care, no egg was produced this morning.

This record reflects a real-time condition of livestock status, captured without assumption or projection. The absence of egg production is documented as factual observation, not interpreted as decline or recovery.

Such data is essential in real-work farming environments, where biological outcomes fluctuate due to age, stress, environmental change, or prior events. Recording both presence and absence of expected outputs is fundamental to DGCP principles, ensuring completeness and honesty of data.

This image is preserved as ground-truth evidence, with embedded timestamp serving as verifiable temporal reference within MaMeeFarm’s continuous proof system.
